        public Attribute getAttribute(int index)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAttributeType

        public java.lang.String getAttributeType(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - the position of an attribute from the list
        Returns:
        returns a string ("Float", "Integer" or "String") which is the type of value the attribute at position index from the list stores

      • checkKey

        public boolean checkKey(java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        key - a value set to be compared with the primary key of the entity
        Returns:
        returns true if the key is equal to the primary key of the entity, or else false

      • update

        Updates some if not all the attributes of the entity.
        Parameters:
        tokens - contains the the name of the attributes and the new values which must be replaced
